title: Download the YouTube mobile app - Android - YouTube Help
text: Download the YouTube app for a richer viewing experience on your smartphone. Download the app Note: Downloading the app requires Android 9.0 or later. - Open the Play Store on your mobile device. - Search for "YouTube." - Select the official YouTube app. - Tap Install. Visit the Google Play Help Center to learn more about downloading Android apps. Note: You can also download the YouTube app on your smart TV, streaming device, or game console.
